```{r}
grouped_teams <- Teams %>%
  filter(yearID >= 1955) %>%
  mutate(X1B = H - X2B - X3B - HR,         #calculate number of singles
         TB = X1B + (2*X2B) + (3*X3B) + (4*HR)) %>%    #total bases
  
  
```


```{r}
grouped_batting <- Batting %>%
  filter(yearID >= 1955) %>%
  mutate(X1B = H - X2B - X3B - HR,                     #calculate number of singles
         TB = X1B + (2*X2B) + (3*X3B) + (4*HR)) %>%    #total bases
  group_by(teamID)
  
```
